snippet.title: Gun Skaters - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062130/Gun_Skaters/

Featuring easy controls and addictive shooting mechanic, this game is designed to be enjoyed by 1-4 player(s) online or locally. You can play versus each other, work together to kill zombies, or even play a football game.

This game is super addictive specially with friends and family.

It was a normal day for few cowboys in the desert. They are about to battle when suddenly it started to snow. Now they have to duel wearing an ice skate!

Gameplay modes:

- Last Man Skating: Players battle versus each other. The player that survives 3 rounds first wins
- Football: Players are divided into two teams and the team that scores 5 goals first wins
- Zombie Attack: Players work together to beat waves of zombies

    Features:

   - Play offline with up to 4 players or play online with your friends
   - Rounds are short and quick to complete. Play the game anytime
   - Replay value: level up and unlock new characters
